Item.method_code:
Dim thisType As String = Me.GetType() Dim actionItemId As String = ""
'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Launch()
'only supported on these ItemTypes (or Relationships) Select Case (thisType) Case "gAction Item" actionItemId = Me.getID() end Select
'promote the action item's life cycle to "Open" If actionItemId <> "" Then Dim actionItem As Item = Me.newItem("gAction Item","promoteItem") actionItem.setID(actionItemId) actionItem.setProperty("state","Open") actionItem = actionItem.apply() If actionItem.isError() Then Return actionItem End If Return Me
Item.name: gAction Item Start Action
